裞字的基本解释

裞
shuì
赠送给死者的衣被：“辟阳侯乃奉百金裞。”

裞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shuì］
［《廣韻》舒芮切，去祭，書。］
［《廣韻》他外切，去泰，透。］
(1)馈赠死者的衣被。
(2)谓向死者馈赠衣被。

裞字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【衣字部】　裞； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1118第04
【唐韻】舒芮切【集韻】【韻會】輸芮切，?音稅。【說文】贈終者衣被曰裞。【前漢·朱建傳】乃奉百金裞。又【禮·記註】日月已過乃聞䘮而服曰裞。　又【博雅】祭也。　又他外切，音蛻。義同。

裞字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
裞字的起名意思

暂无。

裞
Basic explanation of words
裞
shuì
The clothes and quilt presented to the deceased: "Hou Piyang is a one-hundred gold man."
裞
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shuì］
["Guangyun" Shu Ruiqie, go to sacrifice, book. ]
["Guangyun" he cut outside, went to Thailand, and thoroughly. ]
(1) Gift clothing and quilts to the deceased.
(2) It is said that the quilt is given to the deceased.
裞
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Jixia] [Department of Clothing Characters] 　裞; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 1118 04
[Tang Yun] Shu Ruiqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Losing Ruiqie, the sound tax. [Said the text] The clothes for the end is called 裞. [Previous Han·Zhu Jian Chuan] It was a hundred gold medals. Also [Ritual·Note] After the sun and the moon have passed, I heard it and took it and said it.　[Bo Ya] Festival also.　He cut outside again, the sound shed. The same meaning.
